hanzi-su-wiki:
匂

Значения

Пахнуть, благоухать

Мнемоника

Человек с воздетыми руками 匕 и согнувшийся человек 勹. Знакомиться, обнюхиваясь — древний обычай дикарей юго-восточной Азии.
purpleculture_pinyin:
xiōng
fragrance, smell
аромат, запах
rtega_mnemonic:
匂匂RSfragrance, smell
  • what comes out of the open mouth 勹 of a man 匕 (offspring 匕 of the mouth 勹)
heisig_constituent: aroma, bound up, spoon, sitting on the ground
heisig_story: You will have to imagine "capturing" a favorite aroma by having it gagged and bound up in a spoon.
koohiiStory1: The muchacho sits down bound up to enjoy his own aroma.
koohiiStory2: If you bind up a person and let him sit for several days, an unpleasant aroma will result.
kunYomi: にお.う、にお.い、にお.わせる
jp_example_words:
匂い(におい): odour, scent, smell, stench, fragrance, aroma, perfume
匂う(におう): be fragrant, smell, to stink, glow, be bright
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You're in prison and all you have is a spoon. You use that prison spoon to scoop up nice scents and fragrances out of the air when you have outdoor time and bring them back into your cell.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: It smells really bad in prison, but your prison spoon is full of all of the lovely scents you remember from when you were free.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You can't remember what any of these scents are anymore, you've been in prison for so long, so you call them all neo-scents (にお). They're neo, they're new.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Try to come with some neo-scents right now. This is neo-laundry, this is neo-flowers, and this is neo-delicious-steak I'll never get to eat because I'm in prison sniffing a spoon.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the wrapped up (勹) spoon (匕) is fragrant

Name meaning

yún
яп. вм. 味
Radicals: 勹, 匕  (prison, spoon)
Meaning Mnemonic
You're in prison and all you have is a spoon. You use that prison spoon to scoop up nice scents and fragrances out of the air when you have outdoor time and bring them back into your cell.
It smells really bad in prison, but your prison spoon is full of all of the lovely scents you remember from when you were free.
Reading Mnemonic
You can't remember what any of these scents are anymore, you've been in prison for so long, so you call them all neo-scents (にお). They're neo, they're new.
Try to come with some neo-scents right now. This is neo-laundry, this is neo-flowers, and this is neo-delicious-steak I'll never get to eat because I'm in prison sniffing a spoon.
